product.name: SOFT CLOSE MAGIC CORNER ,SHEARER STYLE
product.description: Suitable for left opening. ■ Size/ CABINET: 900mm ■ The corner spaces where two perpendicular cabinets meet are often underused. These units convert such spaces into efficient, easy-to-reach storage. To make the most of available space, this top-of-the-line sliding cabinet unit has all-steel undermount slides for quiet, smooth operation. ■ A self-closing mechanism pulls the unit softly shut in the last few inches of travel to prevent slamming. To permit access to both sets of shelves, an articulating slide mechanism pulls the first set along with the door as it opens, while drawing the concealed set of shelves into the space previously occupied by the first.

product.name: LIFT BASKET SHEARER STYLE
product.description: Size/CABINET: 900mm. ■ Higold Lift Basket allows free lift and the use of cabinet space becomes accessible. ■ Higold lift basket is user-friendly that the pulling and resilience force can be adjusted according to the weight of storage. ■ The quick snap structure of lift up system has height adjustment feature that allows easier installation. ■ The pull down basket is mainly made of aluminium that customer don't have to worry about the rust risk even under strict environment. ■ The loading capacity of lift basket can be 18kgs.

product.name: NEBULA LIFT BASKET
product.description: ■ Size/CABINET: 900mm ■ Using space aluminum alloy. Used in aerospace ■ T-shaped handle/ Designed for science exertion ■ 275MM large capacity and 15KG large loading capacity ■ Three-level assist to adjust/ Easy to push and pull

product.name: CAPRI MID WAY SET
product.description: Higold Capri Hanging Set provides simple and easy experience to the kitchen with smart administration of spice racks. ■ Capri Hanging Set provides 2 different options with LED to light up your mood with the gentle light. ■ Capri Hanging Set is made of aluminium and you don't have to worry about the rust risk while the anthracite grey finish of racks also meets the trend. ■ Capri Hanging Set also has LED lights which has a intelligent sensing. A simple action can make it bright. ■ Capri Hanging Set can be easily fixed and removed for cleaning.

product.name: K2 MONARCH STORAGE RACK
product.description: Higold Monatch Set provides luxury experience to the kitchen with smart administration of spice racks. ■ Monarch Hanging Set presents several different options with LED to light up your mood with the gentle light; bluetooth connection, radio and high quaity speakers. On the panel there is in information about: date, day of the week, hour, temperature, humidity and gas indicator ■ Capri Hanging Set is made of aluminium and you don't have to worry about the rust risk while the anthracite grey finish of racks also meets the trend. ■ Capri Hanging Set also has LED lights which has a intelligent sensing. A simple action can make it bright. ■ Capri Hanging Set can be easily fixed and removed for cleaning.

product.description: Enduable aluminum material and stainless steel base , is the best sleek endurable companion of your kitchen cabinet. ■ Size / Cabinet: 600mm、■ The aluminum drawer basket is sleek and smooth , the best option for modular kitchen. ■ Undermount slides which guarantee over 50,000 cycle testing. Maximum loading capacity is up to 30 kgs. ■ Flexible accessories especially for spoon, fork , chopsticks , dishes ,bowls , pans , pots .,etc ,can be easily adjustabe or removed from the drawer pull out basket .

Seasoning is the best option for all kinds of kitchenware including chopping borad, cookware ,seasoning , cans and bottles .,etc ■ The seasoning basket is with bottom mounting structure , no need to store left & right opening mechanism at the same time . ■ The basket can be equipped with non soft close ball bearing slide or undermount slides, more flexible for projects or household usage.

product.name: SHEARER TOURBILLON ROTATING PANTRY
product.description: The legend of pull out basket- Tourbillion circles Pantry - 5 trays A mechanical piece of art with all-in-one storage your own grocery Simple Installation, Effortless Operation 360 smooth rotation and provide excellent access to the cabinet interior Easy access with smooth turntable trays Deliver the entire inner storage portion A broader view of the cabinet space Self-return trays keep cabinets neat and tidy: Rotatable trays can be automatically returned to the origin, no more messy cabinets Heavy loading slide-Smooth and silent movement Flexible adjustable for the tray to fit tall or short items Universal opening, no need to limit your cabinet
